entry.dcterms:description: health characteristics of population, opinion about AIDS, sexual habits of the respondent, evaluation of homosexuality
entry.dcterms:subject: family life, marriage, relationship

childbearing, family planning and abortion
health condition
person
survey data
cross-section
A sample of 2000 persons, containing 83 settlements; the sample can be divided into two samples of 1000 persons, representative of Hungary's population aged 15 and over.
Data collection with questionnaire, administered by interviewers, and self-administered questionnaires.
A
